name: arcibi
text: Arthur's horrified expression in panel five is priceless

name: kyrasmash
text: That quivering lip really makes it.

name: agika
text: Ooh, Pat did not just say that Ray has an apple for a brain - that is a most terrible insult that I shall have to use more often now.

name: buster
text: an apple for a brain wouldn't be too shabby for a house cat

name: riazm
text: "Apple for a brain, motherfucker." does have a delightful rhythm.

name: slab64
text:
I got a trunk full of amps motherfucker

A trunk full of amps mother.... FUCKER

name: choosebro
text: It's almost Iambic pentameter. Almost

name: ted0phile
text: My good man, I'm not sure if you actually know what iambic pentameter is.

name: karljw
text: it's actually almost trochaic pentameter. Almost

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Not that far from ironic pentameter.

name: hollis
text: Why shouldn't we go to sandy beaches?

name: soticoto
text: They have sharks of intense anger.

name: the_voice
text: They are a place of the fat and underclothed.

name: johnnyrocker
text:
Because Pat is a dick.
To most people, a sandy beach is nice, but Pat can only see the flaws.

name: kickstart
text: I thought it meant like, even though being angry is fun (like going to the beach), we shouldn't do it.  Yours makes more sense though.

name: slab64
text: I thought as you do. Basically saying that anger is the easy way out, the most natural response, but that to resist it is noble.

name: wittyname
text: So no more sand castles for you.

name: wildcat
text: All sand getting in your underpants. All seagulls getting ready to poop on ya.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Pat didn't shop around before buying a cell phone, and now he is locked into a contract and terrified of high bills.

name: i_love_kate
text: More likely Pat did indeed spend a great deal of time deliberating over which phone/contract to go for, and opted for the one which would allow him to spend more time complaining and insulting those who call him.

name: tekende
text: There is no way that this is not true.

name: deancain29
text: I love Arthur.

name: hateandwar
text: Arthur would be my favorite character if he showed up more than a few times.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
I love Arthur 2

[IMGS OFF]

name: fineoakstructure
text:
OH GOD DAMMIT

[IMGS OFF]

name: mega_panda
text: does Pat have a late sixties mustang (that kinda looks like the horse logo on the grill)? are you even allowed to be an asshole if you own a car like that?

name: madnes
text:
That's MY car. He stole it.


Asshole.

name: atmus
text: Even worse, it's a Mustang 2.  You pretty much have to be an asshole to drive one of those on purpose.

name: ford
text: I'd rather push a chevy than drive a ford.  And my NAME is ford.

name: fattypneumonia
text:
Ford... Fairlaine?

[IMGS OFF]

name: red-barchetta
text: Yeah, produced in the late 70's. Some of them even had 4 cylinder engines. A major asshole-mobile.

name: scott_karana
text: It's not like the Foxbody Mustangs didn't offer fourbangers...

name: atmus
text: Yeah, but that was to bring the over-all fuel economy up.  The Mustang 2's did it just to be an asshole.

name: smallberries
text: Does anyone else goggle at Chris' choice of cars? They're *total* retro-rides, lovingly-rendered: Volvo 240GL of Despair, Subaru Brats (in Hell!), Mustang II, Galaxie, 60's Mini Cooper, Todd's van (orally bought), etc. I'm holding out for these dorky oddballs: Aztek, Justy 4x4, Gremlin, Bugeye Sprite or Honda Z600.

name: patkun
text: I've started using 'apple for a brain'. It's great, becasue it's a higly effective insult that can be used in any environment. 'Motherfucker' is an optional addition.

name: never_die
text:
Anything involving Pat's cellphone is like getting an invitation for a beach party.

On the Sandy Beach of Anger.

name: yingkaixing
text: That sounds like a flick that Pat would rent.

name: mercuri0us
text: Directed by Rod Huggins.

name: kickstart
text: Starring Jeffrey Morgan-Taylor as "Sandy"

name: timasi
text: A comment left by timasi was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Zem, cailetshadow, mrblank91)

name: serf
text:
arthur needs to be around more often. hes amazing....

and i'd like to see mister gary

name: dasilodavi
text: A comment left by dasilodavi was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, rowboat, thesyndicate88, Darthemed)

name: salo
text: Someone's been sitting on the beach without any trousers on.

name: shinkusan
text: Chubby for avatar/comment synergy.

name: thatcrazycommie
text: I just fucking love that Pat never considers the fact that it might actually be an emergency.

name: deusoma
text: To be fair, it is Ray calling him.

name: tim_simmons
text: all achewood characters have awesome cars

name: saturnbeads
text: Pat is an Asshole.

name: luckypyjamas
text:
pat is a dick

and an asshole

hm...

name: the_doz
text: he can just go fuck himself

name: blotto
text:
Saturnbeads with the bump,
Luckypyjamas sets it up...
and The_Doz with the HUGE spike!
BOOM goes the dynamite!

name: professorhazard
text: The alt text says "Mister Gary runs the Anger Management Support Group"... but Mister Gary isn't even mentioned in this strip!

name: gussiejives
text: The best part of this strip is the subtlety of Pat keeping himself on the far left edge of the driver's seat.

name: stormagnet
text: But what kind of apple? Because if Pat is implying that Ray runs on RISC, he might not be too far off. High performance, only a few instructions- mostly having to do with gettin' mad rutty.

name: techiebabe
text: This is my reaction whenever anybody texts me.  I have a horrible plan from Cingular (now owned by AT&T).

name: bizarro8mybaby
text: you, pat, and i are in a club.  It is not the fun kind.

name: mrectomy
text: Panel 4 made me snort out loud. 5/5
